title: Room for Escort / Working Girl in West London
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Nice ground floor apartment in a modern development, close to Hanger Lane and Alperton tube stations. Can be listed under Wembley or Ealing, on the border of both.
This double bedroom is £80 per day and has a king size bed with nearly new high quality mattress, built in wardrobe, bedside table with lamp. Attractive bathroom with shower and kitchen with microwave and utensils etc plus Wi-Fi, new bedding and towels. Secure entry phone system. Share flat with just one other long term girl.
3 day minimum stay.
